about_the_game:
Introduction

This is a Souls-like game that I’ve developed on my own after leaving my job.

It’s made using free resources and features a Tiger Mountain God.

This version is a demo.

Game

The game follows a journey to restore the distorted space-time caused by Mountain Gods residing in Korea. With the help of various NPCs, you must recover your lost power and return the world to its original state.

  • Basement Area: This is a safe zone where you can interact with various NPCs. Here, you can prepare by enhancing equipment or attaching shards to your Divine Orb.

  • Tangled Forest Area: The journey officially begins here. Watch as different worlds mix together and cause unpredictable events.

Combat System

Avoid enemy attacks and, when possible, deal critical blows.

Customize your combat style by attaching fragments to your Divine Orb.

Other

This is a solo development project.

In the demo version, you can experience part of the planned areas and the early combat system. More areas and characters will be added in future versions.

The demo version is slightly different from the early access version.

name: Project SJHG - Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11 64bit
  • Processor: Ryzen 3600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 2060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11 64bit
  • Processor: TBD
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: TBD
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 128 GB available space

short_description: The Journey to Restore the Distorted Time and Space
